attributes.action: stop trying to defer English self-determination by refusing to admit that their should be an English parliament!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The English nation demands equality with scotland, wales and northern ireland. Scotland has it's own parliament. Why doesn't England have it's own parliament? There is no legitimate reason for denying England a parliament. 
Why does scotsman Mr Anthony Blair continue to deny England equality with scotland? He rufuses England a parliament. Why?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
